Description: Maestro by Gibson Les Paul Standard Guitar Cherry Sunburst Maestro is Gibson entry level, affordable guitar line. This model is based on the 1952 Les Paul. The guitar is in good condition, it has a few dings and scratches, the back has buckle rash. The head is missing the truss rod cover, the top strap peg is also missing. Please see the pictures for complete condition.
